abstract: Biogen Idec on Thursday rejected billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn’s proposed slate of corporate directors, setting the stage for a proxy fight for control of the biotechnology company’s board.
lead_paragraph: Biogen Idec on Thursday rejected billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn’s proposed slate of corporate directors, setting the stage for a proxy fight for control of the biotechnology company’s board.

headline.main: Bioegn Idec Rejects Icahn Slate as Unsuitable
